channel.title: Studio Mizutama Official Site
channel.description: Recent content on Studio Mizutama Official Site

item.title: See With You project on Kickstarter!
item.description: Our crowd funding is available on Kickstarter! The second episode of With You is leveraged by this. https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/studio-mizutama/kimi-to-issho-niwith-you

item.title: The official site has been launched!
item.description: We have launched the official site. Our latest activities are published here.

item.title: WITH YOU
item.description: Introduction With You / Kimi to Issho ni is a short independent animation movie launched from Japan. The anime illustrates young lovers' runaway, struggling between life or death.

item.title: ECONTE
item.description: Econte is open source storyboarding tool. Make it easy to build storyboard, set sequence, timing.
